Directed by: Jean-Christophe Lie
Genre: Comedy, Animation
Running Time: 00:10:00
Year of Production: 2009

Synopsis: Late seventies, an imaginary suburb. The custom is to wear no underwear, no pants, only orange tops. With the help of an insurgent masked as a blue R8 Gordini, Mister R and his wife prepare a radical clothing revolution and launch an attack against monochromatic orange totalitarianism.
